roles.title: Software Engineering Intern
roles.description: Worked on building agentic workflows to streamline the process of writing equity research reports and understanding financial documents. Built user interfaces and managing database systems.

roles.title: Backend Developer
roles.description: Building features for the Berkeleytime web application, Berkeley's premier course planning website serving over 10,000 students. Learned how to use GraphQL for creating APIs and TypeScript for backend development.

roles.title: Machine Learning Consultant
roles.description: Developed synthetic data generation and validation pipelines. Used generated data to fine tune a Large Language Model for entity extraction. Automated processes for model selection and hyperparameter tuning.

roles.title: Frontend Developer Intern
roles.description: Created interactive components and layouts using React.js with Next.js. Optimized data latency and API calling times through dynamic rendering and efficient data querying. Designed layouts for 30+ pages.
